verbose_text: In contrast, all of the mice immunized with higher doses of ST938 (4.5 x 10 3-7 CFUs) did not show appreciable sign of illness after the challenge with 40,000 CFUs of LVS in the 4-week observation period, indicating that DeltacapBCA is able to induce strong adaptive immunity against infection of F. tularensis LVS even at relative low doses of immunization (e.g., 10 3-4 CFUs).
evidence: DeltacapBCA is able to induce strong adaptive immunity
